Text:
New Baldacci, new James Patterson (Murder club 10) as well as some others in Fiction.

Some new ones in non-fiction that look interesting too.  Great work - thank you!

I would like to thank you for this and other past e-books you have uploaded over the past months.  Especially for the transition to epub and mobi so even calibre is not needed for a good read.  Keep it up and thank you again.
I can not take credit for most of these uploads just passing forward and sharing
What are your sources?  I am looking for 'The Speech' by Bernie Sanders and 'Back to our Future' by David Sirota
